ANTHRO_GEOM_DGOS: Discrete Geographic Objects - The valley bottom split into a sampling frame of polygons where the IGO points are at the center of each polygon.
ANTHRO_DGOS: DGOs attributed with values related to anthropogenic impact calculated with the DGO extent.
ANTHRO_GEOM_LINES: The original NHD flow lines intersected with land ownership, road and rail.
ANTHRO_LINES: NHD Flowlines attributed with values related to anthropogenic impact.
ANTHRO_GEOM_POINTS: Integrated Geographic Objects - Points placed at a specified distance interval along the valley centerline. This distance is a function of the average valley width for a given stream.
ANTHRO_POINTS: IGOs attributed with values related to anthropogenic impact calculated within a single DGO or an aggregation of DGOs.
LUI: Existing vegetation raster classified into four land use intensity categories.
PRIVATE_LAND: Areas from the ownership input classified as private ownership.
RAIL_VB: Railroad features within the valley bottom.
ROAD_CROSSINGS: Intersection of the road and flowline features (where roads cross streams).
